CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value matches the current value on Account/Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Bill_to_Contact_Email__c ) || ISBLANK(Account__r.Bill_to_Contact_Email__c), "", IF( Bill_to_Contact_Email__c = Account__r.Bill_to_Contact_Email__c, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") + " " + Account__r.Bill_to_Contact_Email__c ) )
CustomField.label: Match? - Bill to Contact Email
